text: The 2015 ATP Challenger China International – Nanchang was a professional tennis tournament played on hard courts. It was the second edition of the tournament which was part of the 2015 ATP Challenger Tour. It took place in Nanchang, China between 14 and 20 September 2015. ==Singles main draw entrants== ===Seeds=== {|class="sortable wikitable" |- ! width="70"| Country ! width="175"| Player ! Rank1 ! Seed |- | | | |1 |- | |Go Soeda |111 |2 |- | |Luca Vanni |123 |3 |- | |Jürgen Zopp |151 |4 |- | |Peter Gojowczyk |153 |5 |- | |Yūichi Sugita |157 |6 |- | |Thomas Fabbiano |189 |7 |- | |Jordan Thompson |195 |8 |} * 1 Rankings are as of September 7, 2015. ===Other Entrants=== The following players received wildcards into the singles main draw: * He Yecong * Yuqing Ning * Zhuoyang Qiu * Zhicheng Zhu The following player received entry courtesy of a protected ranking: * Amir Weintraub The following player received entry by a special exemption: * Daniil Medvedev The following players received entry from the qualifying draw: * Sriram Balaji * Riccardo Ghedin * Jeevan Nedunchezhiyan * Finn Tearney The following player received entry as a lucky loser: * Dane Propoggia ==Doubles main draw entrants== ===Seeds=== {|class="sortable wikitable" |- ! width="70"| Country ! width="175"| Player ! width="70"| Country ! width="175"| Player ! Rank1 ! Seed |- | |Riccardo Ghedin | |Toshihide Matsui |363 |1 |- | |Hsieh Cheng-peng | |Andrew Whittington |391 |2 |- | |Chen Ti | |Huang Liang-chi |459 |3 |- | | | | | |4 |} *1 Rankings as of September 7, 2015. ===Other entrants=== The following pairs received wildcards into the doubles main draw: * He Feng / Yuqing Ning * He Yecong / Zhuoyang Qiu * Daniil Medvedev / Zhang Zhizhen ==Champions== ===Singles=== * Peter Gojowczyk def. Amir Weintraub, 6–2, 6–1 ===Doubles=== * Jonathan Eysseric / Jürgen Zopp def. Lee Hsin-han / Amir Weintraub, 6–4, 6–2 ==External links== *Official website Category:2015 ATP Challenger Tour Category:ATP Challenger China International – Nanchang
